# <i class="fas fa-user section-icon"></i> About Me

Data Science graduate student at California State University, Chico with a strong background in Computer Engineering. Currently pursuing Master of Science in Data Science and Analytics with a 3.52 GPA.

**Professional Summary:** I am an experienced professional with expertise in web development, data analysis, and machine learning. My technical skills span across Python, R, PHP, Java, and various data science tools. I have a strong background in software development and data visualization, coupled with proven leadership experience in student organizations. I am passionate about leveraging data to drive insights and create impactful solutions that make a difference.

**Key Achievements:** I have successfully led web development projects at Kohli Media LLP, where I contributed to the company's digital presence. My work in machine learning includes developing models for autonomous vehicles, specifically focusing on speed breaker and lane detection. As the President of the Indian Student Association, I have demonstrated strong leadership skills, and my role as a Global Ally at International Education & Global Engagement has allowed me to support and mentor international students.
